sub_title: Project Manager | ADAS & IT Customer Project Management
summary:
Experienced Project Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the automotive & IT industry. Skilled in Vehicle Architecture, System integration, Agile and Waterfall Project Management, Automotive Engineering and Manufacturing. Strong program and project management professional with a Master’s Degree focused in Electrical Engineering/Management with extensive experience in systems and software projects within ADAS, Car Multimedia and IT.
Objective: Project/Product manager position in an international & customer oriented environment, working with innovative products
